Fbuilder module

class Fbuilder.Fbuilder[source]

Bases: object

Provides functionalities to build Z3 formulas models from transitions and save them into a file.

static build_z3_formulas_model_and_save(trGrinder, file_name, only_latest=False)[source]

Builds a Z3 formulas model from the transitions processed by a TransactionsGrinder instance and saves it into a file.

Parameters:

  • trGrinder (TransactionsGrinder) – An instance of TransactionsGrinder containing processed transitions.

  • file_name (str) – The name of the file where the Z3 model will be saved.

  • only_latest (bool, optional) – If True, only the latest transition formula is included in the model, defaults to False.

Returns:

The name of the file where the model is saved.

Return type:

str

static save_infile(str_code, file_name='str_code')[source]

Saves the given string code into a file.

Parameters:

  • str_code (str) – The string code to be saved.

  • file_name (str, optional) – The name of the file to save the code into, defaults to “str_code”.
